The Genetic Disease Screening Program takes allegations of funding fraud, waste and abuse very seriously!!!
The Genetic Disease Screening Program
takes allegations of funding fraud, waste
and abuse very seriously!!!

◼ All complaints regarding potential fraud, waste and abuse of program funding are investigated and employees who report these issues will be protected from retaliation.

Liability Under CFCA Fraudulent acts under the CFCA:
Liability Under CFCA
Fraudulent acts under the CFCA:

Knowingly “presents or causes to be presented” a false claim to the state. Knowingly makes, uses, or causes to be made or used a false record or statement to get a false claim paid or approved. Conspiring to defraud the state by submitting a false claim or be paid one. Delivering less property to the state than stated in the receipt. Falsifying a receipt for state property. Knowingly buying or taking a pledge of public property from another not authorized to sell or pledge the property. Knowingly benefitting from a false claim to the state. Benefits from an inadvertent submission of a false claim and fails to disclose the false claim within a reasonable time after discovery.

What is “Knowingly”?
What is “Knowingly”?

Any person with respect to the information does
